qas.question: What official was the first to visit the grounds of Great Britain from Burma?
Who did the official from Myanmar meet with ?
What was the outcome of the meeting ?

answers.text: Myanmar president declared that all of his nation's political prisoners will be released by the end of 2013

qas.question: Where did the official make his announcement of the meetings outcome ?
What would the official like to see happen between the two countries ?

answers.text: a desire to strengthen links between the UK and Myanmar's military forces

context: Following <a0_0>Thein Sein<a0_0/>'s first ever visit to the UK and a meeting with <a1_0>Prime Minister David Cameron,<a1_0/> the <a2_0>Myanmar president declared that all of his nation's political prisoners will be released by the end of 2013<a2_0/>, in addition to a statement of support for the well-being of the Rohingya Muslim community. In a speech <a3_0>at Chatham House<a3_0/>, he revealed that "We [Myanmar government] are reviewing all cases. I guarantee to you that by the end of this year, there will be no prisoners of conscience in Myanmar.", in addition to expressing <a4_0>a desire to strengthen links between the UK and Myanmar's military forces<a4_0/>.
